section.45: The Book of Oaths (qasamah), Retaliation and Blood Money

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdullah bin Mughaffal that he saw a man throwing pebbles and he said:"Do not throw pebbles, for the Prophet of Allah forbade throwing pebbles," or "he disliked the throwing of pebbles." Kahmas (one of the narrators) was not sure
